item.title: I Told the Medic “Don’t Waste Your Time on Me”
item.description: A veteran recounts a battlefield moment, sharing the story of selflessness, bravery, and the harsh realities of combat when telling a medic not to focus on them.

media:content.media:title: I Told the Medic “Don’t Waste Your Time on Me”
media:content.media:description: A veteran recounts a battlefield moment, sharing the story of selflessness, bravery, and the harsh realities of combat when telling a medic not to focus on them.

item.title: How Close Is Close Quarters Combat?
item.description: Explore the intensity of close quarters combat, examining tactics, reaction times, and the split-second decisions that define engagements in tight, high-stakes environments.

media:content.media:title: How Close Is Close Quarters Combat?
media:content.media:description: Explore the intensity of close quarters combat, examining tactics, reaction times, and the split-second decisions that define engagements in tight, high-stakes environments.

item.title: Finding Love at 100: WWII Veteran’s Story
item.description: Even at 100 years old, WWII veteran Robert Boeke found love. A heartwarming Valentine’s Day story proving it’s never too late for connection and companionship.

media:content.media:title: Finding Love at 100: WWII Veteran’s Story
media:content.media:description: Even at 100 years old, WWII veteran Robert Boeke found love. A heartwarming Valentine’s Day story proving it’s never too late for connection and companionship.

item.title: What I Saw on Omaha Beach
item.description: A veteran shares a haunting firsthand account of Omaha Beach on D-Day, recounting the chaos, courage, and lasting impact of one of WWII’s most intense battles.

media:content.media:title: What I Saw on Omaha Beach
media:content.media:description: A veteran shares a haunting firsthand account of Omaha Beach on D-Day, recounting the chaos, courage, and lasting impact of one of WWII’s most intense battles.

item.title: Marine Combat at Peleliu in the Pacific
item.description: Explore the intense combat faced by Marines during the Pacific’s Battle of Peleliu, highlighting strategies, challenges, and historical significance of this World War II battle.

media:content.media:title: Marine Combat at Peleliu in the Pacific
media:content.media:description: Explore the intense combat faced by Marines during the Pacific’s Battle of Peleliu, highlighting strategies, challenges, and historical significance of this World War II battle.

item.title: Biggest Problem with WWII Anti-Tank Weapons
item.description: Learn about the main challenges of using anti-tank weapons during WWII, including effectiveness, limitations, and battlefield impact.

item.title: Realizing I Was a Quadruple Amputee
item.description: A personal story of coming to terms with being a quadruple amputee, sharing emotional challenges, resilience, and the journey toward adaptation and strength.

item.title: What It Means to Be a Ranger in Vietnam
item.description: A Vietnam veteran shares firsthand experiences and insights into the life, challenges, and camaraderie of serving as a Ranger during the Vietnam War.

media:content.media:title: What It Means to Be a Ranger in Vietnam
media:content.media:description: A Vietnam veteran shares firsthand experiences and insights into the life, challenges, and camaraderie of serving as a Ranger during the Vietnam War.

item.title: Herbert Sisk on Patton’s “Tough ‘Ombres”
item.description: WWII veteran Herbert “Bill” Sisk of the 90th Infantry Division shares why General Patton nicknamed his unit the “Tough ‘Ombres” during the Utah Beach invasion.

media:content.media:title: Herbert Sisk on Patton’s “Tough ‘Ombres”
media:content.media:description: WWII veteran Herbert “Bill” Sisk of the 90th Infantry Division shares why General Patton nicknamed his unit the “Tough ‘Ombres” during the Utah Beach invasion.

item.title: Why I Loved the BAR
item.description: A veteran shares personal experiences and insights on the BAR (Browning Automatic Rifle), explaining why it was valued for reliability and impact in combat.

item.title: He Knew He Could Make It Without Power
item.description: Watch the story of determination and skill as he navigates challenges without relying on power, showcasing ingenuity, resilience, and problem-solving under pressure.
